# tf.config.optimizer.set_jit


<table class="tfo-notebook-buttons tfo-api" align="left">

<td>
  <a target="_blank" href="/api_docs/python/tf/config/optimizer/set_jit">
  <img src="https://www.tensorflow.org/images/tf_logo_32px.png" />
  TensorFlow 2 version</a>
</td>

<td>
  <a target="_blank" href="https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.15/tensorflow/python/framework/config.py#L91-L98">
    <img src="https://www.tensorflow.org/images/GitHub-Mark-32px.png" />
    View source on GitHub
  </a>
</td></table>



Set if JIT compilation is enabled.

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/config/optimizer/set_jit"><code>tf.compat.v1.config.optimizer.set_jit</code></a>
* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/config/optimizer/set_jit"><code>tf.compat.v2.config.optimizer.set_jit</code></a>


``` python
tf.config.optimizer.set_jit(enabled)
```



<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


#### Args:


* <b>`enabled`</b>: Whether to enable JIT compilation.
